thread.title: Residente: ‘Trump is making a fool of himself’
thread.title_full: Residente: ‘Trump is making a fool of himself’

author: Fusion
title: Residente: ‘Trump is making a fool of himself’
text:
Copy Link http://fus.in/2kU13nE Embed Code <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://player.ooyala.com/tframe.html?embedCode=ltdG1rOTE6PBTL-89gHGSxZiFOatjXSW&pbid=6233f5fb56044b649b50dde3c5893e9d" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe> 
For his latest album, Puerto Rican writer, musician, and producer Residente traveled the world, from Burkina Faso to Armenia to China. “When I started to travel, I discovered that we are equally different, and we came from the same place,” he says. “We can’t have walls that divide us.” His message to those resisting in Trump’s America: “march and protest and unite.”
